name: intermenstrual
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between the times every month when blood normally flows from a woman's uterus (= the part of the body in which a baby grows): The woman had experienced intermenstrual bleeding. The doctors adminstered the drug during the intermenstrual period. Related word
menstruate
More examplesFewer examplesIt can sometimes be difficult to differentiate inter-menstrual bleeding from irregularly frequent periods.The incidence of intermenstrual bleeding during treatment decreased rapidly after the first cycle.Endometritis should be considered as a possibility in all young women who have intermenstrual bleeding.
